sectionDescription: A comprehensive collection of human knowledge reinterpreted through the perspectives of animals who have observed and documented our world

books.title: Knowledge Book Vol.1
books.description:
A collection of 20th–21st century human knowledge compiled by cats, dogs, birds, and reptiles spying on the human world
(Scheduled for Summer 2026)

books.title: Knowledge Book Vol.2
books.description:
A knowledge book that explains modern human engineering—centered on terraforming—from the perspective of animals
(Scheduled for Spring 2026)

books.title: Knowledge Book Vol.3
books.description:
A speculative science and philosophy book told by marsupials who once attempted to escape the Earth
(Scheduled for Fall 2026)
